verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise עֲלֵ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> go up בֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel וְשֶׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> and dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> there and make שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar לָאֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> unto God הַנִּרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> that appeared אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you בְּבָרְחֲךָ֔ <S%H1272><s%> unto thee when thou fleddest מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the face עֵשָׂ֥ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau אָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> thy brother

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> Then Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his household וְאֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with הָסִ֜רוּ <S%H5493><s%> and to all that [were] with him Put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּתֹכְכֶ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> that [are] among you וְהִֽטַּהֲר֔וּ <S%H2891><s%> and be clean וְהַחֲלִ֖יפוּ <S%H2498><s%> and change שִׂמְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8071><s%> your garments

וְנָק֥וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> And let us arise וְנַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> and go up בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and I will make שָּׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar לָאֵ֞ל <S%H410><s%> unto God הָעֹנֶ֤ה <S%H6030><s%> who answered אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> me in the day צָֽרָתִ֔י <S%H6869><s%> of my distress וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> been עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> against בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and was with me in the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I הָלָֽכְתִּי׃ <S%H1980><s%> which I went

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> all the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> which [were] in their hand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּזָמִ֖ים <S%H5141><s%> and [all their] earrings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H241><s%> which [were] in their ears וַיִּטְמֹ֤ן <S%H2934><s%> hid אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָאֵלָ֖ה <S%H424><s%> them under the oak אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was near שְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7927><s%> which [was] by Shechem

וַיִּסָּ֑עוּ <S%H5265><s%> And they journeyed וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become חִתַּ֣ת <S%H2847><s%> and the terror אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הֶֽעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> was upon the cities אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> that [were] round about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not רָֽדְפ֔וּ <S%H7291><s%> them and they did not pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> So Jacob ל֗וּזָה <S%H3870><s%> to Luz אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> that [is] Bethel ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> he and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and called לַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> God בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> Beth-el כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there נִגְל֤וּ <S%H1540><s%> appeared אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> because there God בְּבָרְח֖וֹ <S%H1272><s%> unto him when he fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from the face אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> of his brother

וַתָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> died דְּבֹרָה֙ <S%H1683><s%> But Deborah מֵינֶ֣קֶת <S%H3243><s%> nurse רִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> Rebekah's וַתִּקָּבֵ֛ר <S%H6912><s%> and she was buried מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לְבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> beneath Bethel תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָֽאַלּ֑וֹן <S%H437><s%> under an oak וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> of it was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and the name אַלּ֥וֹן בָּכֽוּת׃ <S%H439><s%> Allonbachuth פ

וַיֵּרָ֨א <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again בְּבֹא֖וֹ <S%H935><s%> again when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> out of Padanaram וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> unto him Thy name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> [is] Jacob לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall no יִקָּרֵא֩ <S%H7121><s%> shall not be called שִׁמְךָ֨ <S%H8034><s%> thy name ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> any more Jacob כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> but Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> to him שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> shall be thy name וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ל֨וֹ אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I am אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> unto him I [am] God שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> Almighty פְּרֵ֣ה <S%H6509><s%> be fruitful וּרְבֵ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> and multiply גּ֛וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation וּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> and a company גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of nations יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> at וּמְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> shall be of thee and kings מֵחֲלָצֶ֥יךָ <S%H2504><s%> out of thy loins יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> shall come

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֛תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I gave לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וּלְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac לְךָ֣ אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <S%H5414><s%> to thee I will give it וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> and to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> after thee אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up מֵעָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> Then אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> And God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> from him in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> where he talked אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיַּצֵּ֨ב <S%H5324><s%> set up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מַצֵּבָ֗ה <S%H4676><s%> a pillar בַּמָּק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> where he talked אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> with מַצֶּ֣בֶת <S%H4678><s%> with him [even] a pillar אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stone וַיַּסֵּ֤ךְ <S%H5258><s%> and he poured עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> out נֶ֔סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> a drink offering וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> thereon and he poured עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> oil

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> for שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> where God בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> with him Bethel

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> And they journeyed מִבֵּ֣ית אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> from Bethel וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> there was ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and there was but כִּבְרַת־ <S%H3530><s%> a little הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> way לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come אֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H672><s%> to Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> travailed רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> and Rachel וַתְּקַ֥שׁ <S%H7185><s%> and she had hard בְּלִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3205><s%> labour

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> was in בְהַקְשֹׁתָ֖הּ <S%H7185><s%> And it came to pass when she was in hard בְּלִדְתָּ֑הּ <S%H3205><s%> labour וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָ֤הּ הַמְיַלֶּ֙דֶת֙ <S%H3205><s%> that the midwife אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> unto her Fear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he לָ֖ךְ בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> not thou shalt have this son

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּצֵ֤את <S%H3318><s%> was in departing נַפְשָׁהּ֙ <S%H5315><s%> And it came to pass as her soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֔תָה <S%H4191><s%> (for she died וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> ) that she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name בֶּן־ אוֹנִ֑י <S%H1126><s%> Benoni וְאָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> but his father קָֽרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> called ל֥וֹ בִנְיָמִֽין׃ <S%H1144><s%> him Benjamin

וַתָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> died רָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> And Rachel וַתִּקָּבֵר֙ <S%H6912><s%> and was buried בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way אֶפְרָ֔תָה <S%H672><s%> to Ephrath הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> which [is] Bethlehem

וַיַּצֵּ֧ב <S%H5324><s%> set יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob מַצֵּבָ֖ה <S%H4676><s%> a pillar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <S%H6900><s%> upon her grave הִ֛וא <S%H1931><s%> he מַצֶּ֥בֶת <S%H4678><s%> that [is] the pillar קְבֻרַֽת־ <S%H6900><s%> grave רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> of Rachel's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to this הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> unto this day

וַיִּסַּ֖ע <S%H5265><s%> journeyed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> and spread אָֽהֳלֹ֔ה <S%H168><s%> his tent מֵהָ֖לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> beyond לְמִגְדַּל־ עֵֽדֶר׃ <S%H4029><s%> of Edar

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁכֹּ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> dwelt יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And it came to pass when Israel בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in that land הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> that Reuben וַיִּשְׁכַּ֕ב֙ <S%H7901><s%> and lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְהָ֖ה֙ <S%H1090><s%> with Bilhah פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> concubine אָבִ֑֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father's וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יִשְׂרָאֵֽ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel פ וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> [it] Now the sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> of Leah בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> firstborn יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob's רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> Reuben וְשִׁמְעוֹן֙ <S%H8095><s%> and Simeon וְלֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> and Levi וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> and Issachar וּזְבוּלֻֽן׃ <S%H2074><s%> and Zebulun
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> of Rachel יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin
וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons בִלְהָה֙ <S%H1090><s%> of Bilhah שִׁפְחַ֣ת <S%H8198><s%> handmaid רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel's דָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan וְנַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> and Naphtali
